product_name: ExOfficio BugsAway Sandfly Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: Sport the lightweight, travel-savvy 30 in. inseam ExOfficio BugsAway(R) Sandfly(TM) Pants to repel biting mosquitoes and burning solar rays while you're in the mountains. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel helps keep biting and potentially disease-carrying insects at bay. Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel is effective through 70 washes. Nylon fabric wicks moisture, dries fast and provides UPF 30 protection against the sun to keep you comfortable outdoors. Full-length inseam gusset allows unrestricted range of motion. Mesh ventilation built into the inseam gusset lets air circulate to keep you cool. Pant cuffs snap up for when you're wading across a stream or want a little extra ventilation. 2 hand pockets, 2 back pockets and a drop-in side pocket stow your essentials. The ExOfficio BugsAway Sandfly Pants have a standard fit.
short_description: Sport the lightweight, travel-savvy 30 in. inseam ExOfficio BugsAway(R) Sandfly(TM) Pants to repel biting mosquitoes and burning solar rays while you're in the mountains.
